modName: Worldwide Weaponry - Weapons For Every Occasion
summary: Adds craftable weapons and armour to Skyrim, requiring either Steel-, Dwarven-, or Ebony- Smithing perks. They can be found under the "steel" smithing category once you have the appropriate perk.
descriptionHtml:
[font= Verdana]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ENTKRWj.jpg[/IMG]

OP delivers? Can it be? 0.0

- For when the corpses of your fallen foes aren't adequate company on your lonely nights out
- got a moment? check out my "Finding Nemo" [pun intended] article in the "Articles" Tab


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2vRBtZH.png[/IMG]



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ouYoKxb.jpg[/IMG]
Add variety to your killing spree!

This is a weapon pack I threw together because I was bored and I felt it was time to contribute to this great community. Inside you'll find new weapons, a set of armor, and a fancy new shield - all of 'em bright and shiny and Dual Sheath Redux Compatible to boot.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mzfLf90.jpg[/IMG]
[u]Pravus:[/u] - wielded by the sensual [redacted], this is a sexy sword with a sexy purpose. Pravus is latin - it means Depraved. Through the grace of the divines a soul even in the depths of depravity may find a thief's virtue. I know it isn't much consolation after those damn pickpockets lift your last septim, but at least with Pravus you stand a chance retrieving it no?
tl;dr - pointy end goes in, enemy's lights go out.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MZHjiH1.jpg[/IMG]
[u]Impunitas:[/u] - A deadly blade used by a deadly Dunmer. Called by many names, Nemo "the Red Devil" Hlaalu makes use of a blade very much suited to its master's macabre occupations. Also like its master, the blade eloquently captures the razor edge between the path of impunity and that of damnation. Impunitas has been many an unfortunate soul's final repentance.



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AUn3R6Q.jpg[/IMG]
All you need is a current version of Skyrim, barring that, a nice hot cup of tea - who doesn't like tea? (or coffee, for those of you who like to live life dangerously)



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LSry5g2.jpg[/IMG]
[u]Manually:[/u] copy files to your Skyrim Directory.

Put the '001RR_WeaponPack.esp' in the same folder as the Skyrim .bsa files and .esm files (ie: Skyrim.bsm, Skyrim - animations.bsa etc. etc.)

merge my 'data' folder with the existing one, unless updating you shouldn't be prompted to overwrite.

Folder Hierarchy:
Skyrim
001RR_WeaponPack.esp

Data
Meshes
001RR_...

Textures
001RR_...

[u]via NMM:[/u] just click download and activate it once it's finished. Easy right?



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rNcMLrT.jpg[/IMG]
1) ALWAYS make a clean save when uninstalling - make a save (not a quicksave/autosave), uninstall the mod, load save (it'll give a missing content warning - ignore it), save again.
*it's also a good idea to back up your saves folder once in a while (it's in your "my directoriesmydocuments" folder)

2)[u]Manually:[/u] Those files up there? ya, get rid of 'em xD
I've prefixed all the assets of this mod with '001RR_...', so it's safe to delete anything in there.

**Do not EVER delete any skyrim assets - anything that isn't either in a folder marked "001RR_..." or that doesn't start with "001RR_..."
(if you already did - y'know, right after I told you not to - google "Steam Verify Game Cache")

[u]Via NMM[/u]: double click the mod to deactivate it (this will uninstall the files, but keeps the zipped folder on your harddrive)

**if you want to permanently get rid of it, press delete or go to the big red button that says "delete selected mod."



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QNbBbfg.jpg[/IMG]
Should be compatible with all other mods - I'm just throwing some more meshes in. I haven't edited Leveled lists or any other existing forms.
That being said there is always a possibility that I missed something or mucked up; if you find a problem let me know!

** some of my meshes have rather high polycounts - looking at you Rapier -.-
while not exactly professional (working on it!) it could lead to performance losses if you try rendering 5000 of them on screen at once...
ya don't do that...

IMHO: it shouldn't be a problem, I'm running skyrim with 90+ mods on a laptop with 6gb of RAM, Intel Integrated HDGraphics 4000 (intel core i3 processor, no dedicated graphics card) @ 2.40ghz, and it has yet to burst into flames (knock on wood)!

PS. I'll be updating this pack as time permits - I've got a lot more meshes lying around! If you have anything you particularly want to see in game feel free to post your request and I'll give it my best shot!



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oYLaZft.jpg[/IMG]
Don't use it to make money, don't pass it off as your own, don't put it on steamworks (or anywhere else for that matter), don't forget to eat 3 balanced meals a day.

DO use it in your own mods (please don't forget to credit me and all original mod authors + give us a heads up first!)

DO retexture it, play around with it, see how it works - If you've got questions I'll see if I can help!

DO have fun with it! I'm releasing it because I had fun making and playing it!

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZM0ZEJ9.jpg[/IMG]
I made the meshes myself - sometimes referring to others floating around the web for scale and/or inspiration - but all made from scratch using coffee and Maya 2012.
Unless otherwise stated, textures are either my own or modified Bethesda resources.

Bethesda definitely gets top spot here! Thanks for the great game and great tools!

Neovalen for his work on Dual Sheath Redux
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34155//?] Get it Here! [/url]

I've decided that I can't do any better than Mr.Dave's Feather Textures so credits go to him:
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2324/?] Link for the Lazy [/url]

Credits also go to TrebTreb for his work on the custom sigils pack, which makes it super easy to get custom shields in game:
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21037//?] woah so many links [/url]

Credits also go to L0rd0fWar for his work in porting over the Witcher 2 Models:
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588//?] last but not least [/url]
[/font]
author: ShogunL16

files.name: Worldwide Weaponry V1_1a
files.changelogHtml: added 1H and 2H versions of the Heron Marked Sword (DSR compatible)

files.name: Worldwide Weaponry 1_2a
files.changelogHtml:
Retextured Rapier, EspadaRopera, GamblerDagger, Halberd, Kaskara, HuntingArrow, HuntingQuiver, Koummya, Mameluke
Added Ajax' Warhammer ("Unconquered") and Executioner's Sword

files.name: Worldwide Weaponry V1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed blood problem on Executioner Sword
Added 5 new weapons (Panabas, Basket Hilt Claymore, Zaghnal Waraxe, Dadao, and Misericorde)
All weapon retexes
